Package immaculatemap

Class User

java.lang.Object
immaculatemap.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Developer
public class User extends Object
User entity used for storing user data, storing user data, and performing operations on that user data.

Example Use: 
 
 			User sampleUser = new User(true, "Name", "password");
 			sampleUser.getName();
 			sampleUser.saveToCloud();
 			System.out.println(sampleUser.validateLogin("password");
Example Output: true
Version:
1.0
Author:
Connor McGoey

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User​(Boolean cloudEnabled, String name, String password)
      User constructor. Creates new User object
      Parameters:
      cloudEnabled - whether or not the user signed up with cloud-enabled
      name - User's name
      password - User's password

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Get the User's name
      Returns:
      the User's name

    • addPOI

      public Boolean addPOI​(String POIName, String description, String type, int[] location, Floor floor)
      Add a POI to the User's POI array. Save user info after if changed.
      Parameters:
      POIName - the name of the POI to be added
      description - a description of the POI to be added
      type - the type of the POI to be added
      location - the location of the POI to be added
      floor - the floor of the POI to be added
      Returns:
      true if successfully added to the POI array, false otherwise
      See Also:
      saveUserInfo(boolean), POI

    • removePOI

      public Boolean removePOI​(String POIName)
      Remove a POI from the User's POI array. Save user info after if changed.
      Parameters:
      POIName - name of the POI to be removed
      Returns:
      true if removed
      See Also:
      saveUserInfo(boolean)

    • getFavourites

      public POI[] getFavourites()
      Return an array of the User's favourites
      Returns:
      the User's favourites POI array

    • addFavourite

      public Boolean addFavourite​(POI favourite)
      Add a favourite to the User's POI array POI array. Save changes locally if there was a change.
      Parameters:
      favourite - a POI object to be added into the User's favourites
      Returns:
      true if the object was added, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      saveUserInfo(boolean), POI

    • removeFavourite

      public Boolean removeFavourite​(String POIName)
      Remove a favourite from the favourites array. Save changes if a change is made.
      Parameters:
      POIName - the name of the favourite to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the favourite was removed. False if it wasn't found.
      See Also:
      saveUserInfo(boolean)

    • validateLogin

      public Boolean validateLogin​(String password)
      Validate a User's password
      Parameters:
      password - password to compare to the User's saved password
      Returns:
      true if the passwords match, false otherwise

    • saveUserInfo

      public void saveUserInfo​(boolean isCloudEnabled)
      Save user information locally and format the file name depending on whether they are cloud enabled.
      Parameters:
      isCloudEnabled - whether or not the User has a cloud enabled account

    • getUser

      public static User getUser​(String userName, boolean isCloudEnabled)
      Get the User's locally saved JSON file and return it converted into a user
      Parameters:
      userName - the name of the User
      isCloudEnabled - whether or not the user had cloud enabled
      Returns:
      a User object representation of the information stored locally or null if the user doesn't exist

    • saveToCloud

      public boolean saveToCloud()
      Save/overwrite the User's information to AWS S3 bucket in the cloud.
      Returns:
      true if the upload is successful, false otherwise
      See Also:
      AWSFunctions

    • getFromCloud

      public static User getFromCloud​(String userName)
      Get the cloud saved User information from AWS S3 bucket
      Parameters:
      userName - the name of the User whose information is stored in the cloud
      Returns:
      User object of the information stored in the AWS S3 bucket.
      See Also:
      AWSFunctions

      public static void user_test​(String[] args)
